channel.title: Youth on Ava Francesca Battocchio
channel.description: Recent content in Youth on Ava Francesca Battocchio

item.title: Chapter 11: Gen Z's civic engagement: news use, politics, and cultural engagement
item.description: This chapter explores Gen Z's civic identities and digital media's role in shaping their engagement with public life amid significant challenges.

item.title: Chapter 12: Gen Z's civic engagement: civic skills, political expression, and identity
item.description: Examining Gen Z's evolving civic identity, socio-economic status, and digital media's impact on political engagement and socialization.

item.title: “I Use Social Media as an Escape from All That” Personal Platform Architecture and the Labor of Avoiding News
item.description: This study explores how U.S. young adults design their media worlds across platforms, impacting news use, based on 50 guided interviews on social media.
